title.rendered: Celebrate Family Reunion Month with a Raft Trip

content.rendered:
July is Family Reunion Month. The kids are out of school, the weather has warmed up, and you’ve been saving your vacation days all year. What better way to take some time away from your hectic day-to-day than by celebrating Family Reunion Month with an exciting rafting trip in the Rockies. With AVA Rafting, there’s a whitewater trip available for every family, from the laid back to the thrill seekers.

For a mild trip for the younger kids and a chance to relax for the adults, consider a scenic float trip on the Colorado River. AVA’s guides are great when it comes to children and are sure to make the trip fun and interesting for all ages. Your tweens and teens are sure to have a blast as well, paddling alongside on either a stand up paddle board or “duckie” kayak. There is certainly something for everyone on AVA’s Upper Colorado float trips.

Perhaps you’d like to take it up a notch and have a full whitewater rafting experience. An AVA Browns Canyon on The Arkansas River will definitely suit your needs. This class III stretch of the river is sure to satisfy the thrill seekers of the family. With trips ranging from half a day to 24 hours, be prepared for some serious family bonding.

If you are an adrenaline fueled family, a multi-day adventure may be what you’re in search of. AVA’s Mild to Wild trip offers three days on class III-class V whitewater and two nights of camping riverside. This trip allows for a true backcountry experience complete with hardcore paddling, campfires, rock climbing, fishing, and enjoying all the area has to offer. With the Mild to Wild you are sure to have stories and experiences to share with your family members for years to come.

Whatever your style or however you choose to spend this Family Reunion Month, rest assured that there is a trip out there just for your family. Not interested in whitewater rafting? No worries. AVA offers a variety of adventures from horseback riding to hot air balloon rides. Let an AVA agent plan your special vacation today by calling 877-RAFTING
